Reviews.Title: Didn't work.
Reviews.Author: Paul Homer
Reviews.Content: Couldn't get it to receive any of cameras. I tried for a week. I know it wasn't the cameras because they worked fine with the receivers that came with them.

Reviews.Title: eh
Reviews.Author: benjamin landmesser
Reviews.Content: Its not the greatest thing ever but I did end up getting it to work, when it asks for a password make sure its plugged into our comp and the wall and just hit OK, I think it would work better if my cameras had a stronger signal. But it also stopps working a lot its pretty crappy I wouldn't advise getting this

Reviews.Title: A dream
Reviews.Author: R M
Reviews.Content: This product does not work.  I read the reviews which were all negative, but needing a box which would function as stated I purchased it anyway. Shame on me. I guess I will trash it.

Reviews.Title: It does not work
Reviews.Author: ticked off
Reviews.Content: Either my cameras have the wrong frequencies or this device is no good, there is no way to tell. The meager literature that comes with this product does not say what the 2.4ghz frequencies are. The remote control seems to work because I see the led change when I try it, but it does not show the transmissions from my cameras.

Reviews.Title: Did not work as promised.
Reviews.Author: Robert Gestel
Reviews.Content: It was very difficult to set up. It asked for apassword and refused every password I tried. It si now sitting in my junck box,

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: kl335i
Reviews.Content: The item did not work, and the instructions were basically useless. I would not recommend this product to anyone else.

Reviews.Title: Garbage !!!
Reviews.Author: Christina Wells
Reviews.Content: I am now in the process of sending this thing I ordered back to Japan or where ever it shipped from!! The software didn't even work I couldn't get out the gate. DON'T BUY THIS ... and yes I tried re installing it too,  garbage!!! Dont waste your time and money...now I have to pay to ship it back ...

Reviews.Title: A pig in poke
Reviews.Author: Alex Humble
Reviews.Content: It says 4 channels, but the picture shows only 4 connectors - DC power, USB, IN and OUT. There is only one input! Where to connect three more cameras? The description does not say a word about it and it. I can imagine what a product is when seller originally lies about even number of channels. I desperately need a cheap and simple video recorder, but it is better to avoid this product.

Reviews.Title: what not to BUY!
Reviews.Author: don.2090
Reviews.Content: produce does not work at all.Software ask for users password and does not allow your password to word.tryed to change password a number of time.,still not working.this was and is a rip off.DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCE!

Reviews.Title: not a good buy
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: 4 chanenel sec. camera dvr recievernot worth the money;because it doesn't work and it says you need a security pass word and ID it dind't come with any istructions on how to set up

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: tomas crosman
Reviews.Content: works great with some of the cameras I have. for the price cant beat it.. Be better if it gave the range frequency of the 2.4GHZ

Reviews.Title: What is a headline?
Reviews.Author: John A Mojecki
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because the device came with its instructions on a mini CD which I cannot use in my PC.  My PC, a Dell, has a vertical CD slot which will not take a mini CD. Therefore, I have no instructions to set up the DVR recorder.

Reviews.Title: driver disc doesnt work
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: need to send the right program and drivers or stop saying it works with windows 7 .not happy with this it doesnt work.

Reviews.Title: I like it but.
Reviews.Author: Clay
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace some X10 stuff. It works but only one channel at a time shows on the monitor at a time. All cameras display but only 1 at a time.

Reviews.Title: PRODUCT NOT WORKING
Reviews.Author: CESAR E.
Reviews.Content: BUYING THIS IS NOT A GOOD BUY IT DOESN'T WORK. i MADE A COMPLAINED BUT NO ACTION HAS BEEN DONE

Reviews.Title: Receiver
Reviews.Author: Marilyn J. Moore "Mammy Jo"
Reviews.Content: I like it but I need a new remote, because my dog chewed the other on up. I can't seem to find where to order another remote for this receiver. Can you help me?

Reviews.Title: this is okay but you have to find drivers for it to work right
Reviews.Author: Timmy
Reviews.Content: I only have 1 cam that shows up so far and it took me weeks to find a win 7 driver.I didn't try it on winxp yet but plan on using on an xp machine to record 4 cameras without grainy or scrambled screen

ProductInfo.Features:
Color QUAD Display and not one camera at a time
Email Alert with Image Send to any PC in the world
More DVR features than just record and playback, EVEN WILL,EMAIL a MESSAGE when alarming, lots of options here
Optional HARD WIRING for longer lengths and excellent clarity
Can be used with on TV or VCR, all RCA cables and power include
ProductInfo.Name: 2.4GHz Wireless 4 Channel Security Camera DVR Receiver Motion Detect USB 2.0 output to PC With Remote Control QUAD Display
